text: Plan a trip to Paris next month with a budget of $2000. Include sightseeing and local cuisine.
Plan a 7-day family vacation to Tokyo in December. Budget $5000. Include kid-friendly activities and 4-star hotels.
Business trip to New York from London, March 15-20. Need flights and hotel near downtown. Budget $3000.
Adventure trip to Peru for 10 days. Include hiking, Machu Picchu, and local culture. Budget $4000.
Luxury 5-day trip to Maldives. Include private villa, spa treatments, and fine dining. Budget $15000.
